scene_description_enriched: A bearded, elderly man, likely a saint or holy figure, is depicted seated on a raised, ornate throne. He wears a dark, hooded robe and holds a long staff in his left hand, leaning it against the throne. In his right hand, he holds an open book, suggesting scholarly or spiritual contemplation. The background features a decorative, tessellated pattern within an arched frame, adorned with stylized floral motifs. The figure's halo indicates his sanctity. The scene is framed by decorative borders typical of illuminated manuscripts.
